name: VeritoMail Mailing Software
short_description:
Grow your business with our complete set of professional tools included in one application. Extract targeted Emails and verify them on the go with our Software.

1.Batch or real-time email verification
2.Targeted Email Extraction
3.Powerful Mass Mailer
4.Safe Mailing by setting Burst Limit

Bulk Mailing
Every business expecting to have a presence on the internet needs a bulk email marketing software program and we have the best one for you.

Email Extraction
It is a great helper in conducting email marketing campaigns. Every email campaign requires large lists of email addresses. It’s almost impossible to extract the email addresses manually. It is a perfect tool for building your customers’ email lists quickly.

Email Verification
The problem with bulk mail marketing campaigns is that, more often than not, the emails being sent out are entirely redundant because of wrong email address.
summary: Run effective mass mailing campaigns with one software
